attributes.name: total
attributes.description: The amount of physical RAM in bytes

attributes.name: free
attributes.description: The amount of physical RAM, in bytes, left unused by the system

attributes.name: file_buffers
attributes.description: The amount of physical RAM, in bytes, used for file buffers

attributes.name: cached
attributes.description: The amount of physical RAM, in bytes, used as cache memory

attributes.name: swap_cached
attributes.description: The amount of sawp, in bytes, used as cache memory

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: The total amount of buffer or page cache memory, in bytes, that is in active use

attributes.name: inactive
attributes.description: The total amount of buffer or page cache memory, in bytes, that are free and available

attributes.name: swap_total
attributes.description: The total amount of swap available, in bytes

attributes.name: swap_free
attributes.description: The total amount of swap free, in bytes
